<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skim Scroll](/Feats.aspx?ID=2055) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 189 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Scroll Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=74)

**Prerequisites**
[Scroll Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2053)

</column>

---

You can activate the magic of a scroll with a cursory read as you draw it from your belt. You Interact to draw forth a scroll, then use [Trick Magic Item](/Feats.aspx?ID=857) on the scroll.
name: Skim Scroll
